<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/3/movie/{movie_id}/similar"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint get the similar movies based on genres and keywords.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
